channel.title: Yokoji Zen Dharma Talks
channel.itunes:summary: Monthly Dharma talks by Tenshin Fletcher Roshi at Yokoji-Zen Mountain Center. Yokoji is a year-round Zen Buddhist Training Center in the Southern Californian mountains.
channel.itunes:author: Tenshin Fletcher Roshi
channel.description: Monthly Dharma talks by Tenshin Fletcher Roshi at Yokoji-Zen Mountain Center. Yokoji is a year-round Zen Buddhist Training Center in the Southern Californian mountains.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Monthly Dharma talks by Tenshin Fletcher Roshi from Yokoji Zen Mountain Center

item.title: How Does It Feel In Your Bones?
item.description: Tenshin Roshi takes questions from the members and residents of Yokoji on a Sunday morning.
item.content:encoded: Tenshin Roshi takes questions from the members and residents of Yokoji on a Sunday morning.

item.title: Mechanisms for Change
item.description: Tenshin Roshi talks about how to use the change we experience in our life as food for practice.
item.content:encoded: Tenshin Roshi talks about how to use the change we experience in our life as food for practice.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tenshin Roshi talks about how to use the change we experience in our life as food for practice.

item.title: The Heart of the Matter
item.description: Tenshin Roshi talks on the Heart Sutra in a talk entitled, "The Heart of the Matter". The talk was given on the first day of the New Year's Sesshin at Yokoji.

item.title: The Cutting Edge of Practice
item.description: Tenshin Roshi talks about the cutting edge of practice and the importance of showing up. The talk was given during the Rohatsu sesshin, the retreat that celebrates the enlightenment of Shakyamuni Buddha.

item.title: Buddha's Enlightenment
item.description: Tenshin Roshi talks on the first case of the Denkoroku, or The Record of the Transmission of the Light in honor of Shakyamuni Buddha's enlightenment which is celebrated in our tradition on December 8th.

item.title: Independence
item.description: Given a few days after Independence day, Tenshin Roshi talks on the subject of independence, using the koan "Zuigen's Master" from the Gateless Gate as a starting point.

item.title: Fast Horse, Slow Horse
item.description: Tenshin Roshi brings up case 65 from the Blue Cliff Record, "A Non-Buddhist Questions the Buddha". The talk brings up the question of how important is 'religious' activity in comparison to insight.
item.content:encoded: Tenshin Roshi brings up case 65 from the Blue Cliff Record, "A Non-Buddhist Questions the Buddha". The talk brings up the question of how important is 'religious' activity in comparison to insight.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tenshin Roshi brings up case 65 from the Blue Cliff Record, "A Non-Buddhist Questions the Buddha". The talk brings up the question of how important is 'religious' activity in comparison to insight.
